analysis.description:
BWData.addBoostFromTile (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#227-243) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _tile.claimer == _attacker
	- _tile.claimer == _defender

BWService.storeInitialClaim has external calls inside a loop:
	- isNewTile = bwData.isNewTile(tileId) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#406-410)

BWService.storeInitialClaim has external calls inside a loop:
	- bwData.storeClaim(tileId,_msgSender,valuePerBlockInWei) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#415-416)

BWService.fortifyClaims has external calls inside a loop:
	- (claimer,blockValue) = bwData.getTileClaimerAndBlockValue(_claimedTileIds[i]) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#431-435)

Reentrancy in BWService.attackTile (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#470-540):
	External calls:
	- (claimer,blockValue) = bwData.getTileClaimerAndBlockValue(_tileId) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#476-477)
	- (attackBoost,defendBoost) = bwData.calculateBattleBoost(_tileId,_msgSender,claimer) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#484-486)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- seed (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#497-500)

BWData.addUser (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#131-137) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(user.creationTime == 0) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#135)

BWData.hasUser (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#140-142) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- users[_user].creationTime != 0 (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#142)

BWData.addBoostFromTile (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#227-243) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_boost.defendBoost + _tile.blockValue >= _tile.blockValue) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#237)
	- _tile.claimer == _defender (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#234-243)
	- _tile.claimer == _attacker (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#229-243)
	- require(bool)(_boost.attackBoost + _tile.blockValue >= _tile.blockValue) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#230-231)

BWData.BASE_TILE_PRICE_WEI should be constant (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#55-57)
BWService.WITHDRAW_FEE should be constant (/unique_chucks/37/0x7114e6abb99b00f3255767f4a409e5f5be3b8b83.sol#345)
